mapper.select: select gift_info_id giftInfoId,gift_name giftName,odds percent,amount giveNum,state,create_time createTime,create_man createMan,modify_time modifyTime,modify_man modifyMan ,remark from gift_info where gift_info_id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update gift_info
gift_name = #{giftName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
odds= #{percent},
amount = #{giveNum},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark}
where gift_info_id = #{giftInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
